node.title: NZ Post employee killed by electric buggy in Tawa
node.content: ["An NZ Post employee has died after becoming trapped under one of the company\u2019s Paxter electric buggies in Tawa.", "\"NZ Post is devasted to lose a team member in a tragic accident in Tawa yesterday,\" an NZ Post spokesperson told Newshub.", "\"At this difficult time, our thoughts are with family, colleagues and the wider NZ Post team.\"", "Police confirmed a person died shortly after officers arrived at the scene on Lyndhurst Road at 2.20pm Thursday, and that the workplace fatality had been reported to WorkSafe.", "A WorkSafe spokesperson told Newshub they were aware of \"an incident in Tawa\".", "Enquiries into the circumstances are underway, however initial indications from police are that the vehicle rolled down a small bank on the residential street."]
